context_bundle.summary: MCP registry politics: Microsoft/corporate registries favor telemetry, cloud SaaS, and data pipeline tools. Local-first MCPs absent from official registries by design.

onboarding.quick_start: Build local MCPs, don't rely on corporate registries. Your tools: Everything, Git, Screen, PhiSHRI - none would be 'approved'.
common_patterns: Corporate registry pattern: Telemetry + Cloud SaaS + Enterprise DBs + Microsoft services
Missing from registries: Local file tools, privacy tools, offline-capable tools
Strategy: Build and maintain own MCP ecosystem independent of registry gatekeepers
known_errors: VS Code MCP browser shows Microsoft's curated list - not comprehensive
Approved tools all have cloud/data-collection components
